title: Nostradomus
name: nostradomus
description: Simple addon displaying multiples infos about DOM, in a way to give some global visibility.
author: Simon Ertel

preferences.name: numberDOMelements
preferences.title: Count all node elements
preferences.description: node number in the Document Object Model

preferences.name: listEmpty
preferences.title: List empty nodes
preferences.description: Simple account of DOM element containing no text node or, at least DOM node.

preferences.name: listSpacer
preferences.title: List spacer
preferences.description: List element containing in their 'spacer' in their classname or in their src attribute (for pic).

preferences.name: sae
preferences.title: See all elements
preferences.description: Display a simple outline on all elements. Red for array, yellow for elements abble to receive inline elements, are blue when can't.

preferences.name: hiddenElts
preferences.title: Hidden Elements
preferences.description: How much hidden elements are on the page (based on display:none propertie)

preferences.name: CSSrules
preferences.title: Count CSS
preferences.description: Number of rules and properties containing in each styleSheet and online.

preferences.name: w3cValidator
preferences.title: w3c validator
preferences.description: Use the w3c API for validate the html
